of activities linked to impact. However, it did not include estimates of intensity of resource use, 
which is likely to account for some differences. It acknowledged the likely impact of a number 
of the programmes reviewed, and where feasible estimated effect sizes. (This relation between 
input levels – ‘intensity’ – and size of effect has been rarely examined until recently.)
